Name: Museum of Science & Industry Advisory Council on STEAM Zone
Description: Member of the Museum of Science & Industry Advisory Council on Science, Technology, Art, Engineering, and Math (STEAM) Zone, providing expertise and guidance on interdisciplinary STEAM education initiatives in Tampa, FL.

Name: RISD Digital + Media Graduate Student Journal
Description: Designer for the RISD Digital + Media Graduate Student Journal edited by Frauke Behrendt and Teri Reub, published by Rhode Island School of Design Department of Digital Media in Providence, RI.
